headline: IQVIA and Veeva Announce Long-term Clinical and Commercial Partnerships and Resolution of All Disputes
summary: RESEARCH TRIANGLE PARK, N.C. & PLEASANTON, Calif., August 18, 2025--IQVIA (NYSE: IQV) and Veeva Systems (NYSE: VEEV) today announced global clinical and commercial partnerships and the complete resolution of all pending legal disputes. Under the terms of the long-term agreement, customers can use software, data, technology, and service offerings from Veeva and IQVIA together in a simple and efficient way.
